name: MaRWID - Droid assembly line
description:
My most ambitious comercial project, about a little robot called MaRWID trying to survive assembly line and QA with the use of different testing materials.

Will you be able to solve your way through QA?

Will you uncover the misteries inside the Artic Fox Inc. testing tracks?

Includes a FREE dlc called the RaLP (Rapid Level Production). With this DLC you can create and play custom test chambers or download them from the community page.

Coming soon... ITS OUT AND FREE!!!
